body:
Hey there,  I've experienced a number of small errors in my script that is reoccuring. 1) I'm told to "let Honeybee fly" every single time I open the script.  2) After "let Honeybee fly" then I normally recompute, from time to time recomputing the script solves all the "orange ballons" regarding letting Honeybee fly on the individual components, other times I've to reconnect the inputs on every component still having the orange ballon.  3) A few times when opening the script I get a "red ballon" on the Run Energy Simulation component saying "Solution Exception: DefaultSchedulesLib". I've tried a number of different things to solve the problem, the only solution I've found so far is to replace the Run Energy Simulation component itself. 
I tried leaving the original Run Energy Simulation component and place a new one next to it, and then run both with the exact same inputs. The old doesn't run and the new runs like normal (see attached picture) The script is also attached.  I would be more than happy to hear any good suggestions how to solve these.
